iiv.io

Class AnalyzeColorMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.image.ColorModel
      • java.awt.image.IndexColorModel
        • iiv.display.CNUColorModel
          • iiv.io.AnalyzeColorMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CNUFileObject, iiVScriptable, java.awt.Transparency

    public class AnalyzeColorMap
extends CNUColorModel
    AnalzyeColorMap extends CNUColorModel and allows reading and writing ANALYZE style colormap files.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUColorModel

                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         ColorMapException
        Reads an ANALYZE color map.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to read colors from
        Returns:
        a byte array of colors sized 3*256
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ColorMapException

      • WriteAnalyzeColorMap

        public static void WriteAnalyzeColorMap(java.lang.String filename,
                                        java.lang.Object cd,
                                        java.awt.image.IndexColorModel icm)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        ColorMapException
        Writes an ANALYZE colormap file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to write to
        cd - Determines how to handle write overs if file exists. If cd is null, the file is written over with no warning, else if cd instanceof ContinueDialog, the dialog is used to query the user before writting over, else no write over is performed.
        icm - IndexColorModel to write to file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if error writing to cnufile
        ColorMapException
        See Also:
        ContinueDialog
